awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 14 wins & 29 nominations.

fullplot: When an evil spirit known as Pitch lays down the gauntlet to take over the world, the immortal Guardians must join forces for the first time to protect the hopes, beliefs, and imaginations of children all over the world.
plot: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.
title: Rise of the Guardians
